plot: An 82-year-old refugee comes home to Burundi and tries to rebuild his life after 38 years in exile.
title: The Return of Old Man Kabura
plot_es: An 82-year-old refugee comes home to Burundi and tries to rebuild his life after 38 years in exile.
original_name: The Return of Old Man Kabura
plot_en: An 82-year-old refugee comes home to Burundi and tries to rebuild his life after 38 years in exile.
